poem:
The House Edge

On a Wednesday afternoon in New Jersey,  
Lisa found her fortune vanished,  
a zeroed account speaking louder  
than a stadium's roar.  
  
The promise of a new home  
dissolved like snow on the screen  
of a slot machine;  
meanwhile, the lure of VIP schemes  
whispered sweet nothings  
to the biggest losers.
